column3: you begin to hear hoof beats on the stone road
column4: curious as to who would be going so fast you turn around."

column2: "On the road behind you is a man in shining metal armour riding a horse
column3: behind him seems to be a shark. The shark is closing the gap between it and the knight. What will you do?"

column1: Knight is (?) bringing letter to Jack about the Kingdom being in peril
